message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm asking for $22,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm very interested in the product, but I think $22,000 is a bit too high for my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Can we meet in the middle?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your perspective on the price.  While $22,000 represents the product's true value, I'm willing to come down to $19,000. This is a significant discount and a fair offer considering the quality and potential return on investment.
I appreciate the discount, but $19,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $16,000. Can we discuss further?
